Class NettyHttpServerConfiguration.Parent

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.http.server.netty.configuration.NettyHttpServerConfiguration.EventLoopConfig
io.micronaut.http.server.netty.configuration.NettyHttpServerConfiguration.Parent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Named, EventLoopGroupConfiguration
Enclosing class:
NettyHttpServerConfiguration
@ConfigurationProperties("parent") @Requires(missingProperty="micronaut.netty.event-loops.parent") @Named("netty-server-parent-event-loop") public static class NettyHttpServerConfiguration.Parent extends NettyHttpServerConfiguration.EventLoopConfig
Configuration for Netty parent.
